title: Pooping in Public - Gregway
description:
Public bathrooms? They're a necessary evil. Catch the UFC story on Aisha Tyler's Girl on Guy: http://girlonguy.net/podcast/girl-on-guy-107-greg-miller/

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Leave your questions for Greg in the comments and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to Greg's channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Our Merch Store is live: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Welcome to Gregway today I've got an internet question from JB Hunter he left it in the comments below just like you should like subscribe share all that stuff he says Greg I have a somewhat disgusting question but something I'm wondering how do you guys feel about public restrooms I personally can never poop outside of my house just can't do it work has some nice clean ones but anywhere else nope I usually just drive back to the house or work well JD if that's your real name good question uh no I Greg cannot hold his poop that is something that is well known and documented hopefully you listen to my appearance on the Girl on Guy podcast Aisha Tyler's podcast I told the UFC story there we've hinted at before which in summary was I pooped outside Mark Ryan's house once because I had to poop so bad and I I wish I could tell you that this is a rarity but this used to be like a debilitating like fear kind of thing I'd be like if I knew I was going out that

because I had to poop so bad and I wish I could tell you that this is a rarity but this used to be like a debilitating like fear kind of thing I'd be like if I was going out that night to like the bars and college and stuff be like man I hope I have to poop cuz like I would have to poop, urine, doctor I can hold my piss forever that's that's no problem at all never have I been to the point where I'm like I'm about to pee my pants this is going well I mean obviously when I was a kid but I mean as an adult where I'm like I am screwed here but pooping like I get that urge and it's like oh I will leave in the middle of anything, another YouTube show whatever if it's happening it's going to happen and I just got to get it out of my system as soon as as soon possible so public bathroom bathrooms I mean they're just like you know a product of the system you don't hate the play or hate the game and they are part of they they're the player and the game is my

So public bathrooms, I mean they're just like you know a product of the system, you don't hate the play or hate the game, and they are part of...they're the player and the game is my gastrointestinal tract if you know what I'm saying. So public restrooms, like I'm never I'm never happy about it right? You go in there, you got I hope my shoelaces are tied tight so like the laces don't drag on the bottom and you you hope that they have the little toilet seat covers but then you hope they don't have the automatic flushing system cuz sometimes you know you put the toilet seat cover down and you'll move and that will trigger the automatic flusher thing take the C and you're like God I just got a crap, let me go go to the bath and you lay the toilet paper down that's always like the worst right? That's the the poor man's cover seat you don't want or anything and the worst of course is when you have to go so bad and you get to a bathroom and you get in there and it's just like destroyed.

Right, that's the poor man's cover seat. You don't want or anything, and the worst of course is when you have to go so bad and you get to a bathroom and you get in there and it's just like destroyed. Right, this is what I don't understand about the pooping in public thing: anybody who's going into these stalls to poop - they're all in the same boat. I have to poop so bad or I just have to poop, and I'm not going to make it to another toilet that's like my own thing. So why would anyone destroy the bowl and leave it that way? Like you were just me, you were literally coming around that corner hoping for a clean toilet, found a clean toilet - clean is - and then you made it worse and didn't do anything about it. That's bad. I'm not a fan of that. So yeah, JB, I'm not a huge fan of public bathrooms, but they are a vital part of the poop economy. You can't not have them; you need them there to get the job done sometimes, you know what I mean, and like I'm...

I'm not a huge fan of public bathrooms but they're a vital part of the poop economy. You can't not have them; you need them there to get the job done sometimes, you know what I mean? And I feel for you, dog. I wish that was like in American Pie, he had to go home every time during high school. I admire that kid's fortitude because, like me, it's go time, and it's not like I don't want to do it; it's not like I'm going to poop my pants immediately. But when I get that urge, it's like I said on the Girl on Guy podcast – one in the hand is worth two in the bush. I've got to take the shot while I have it. God only knows what's going to happen next time. So, of course, this is a Gregway; they're disgusting YouTube shows that I post every Wednesday and Friday where I answer your questions. Make sure you leave them in the comments below, then keep on coming back – like, subscribe, share. I love you.
